This repo contains a curated list of Pine Script strategies and indicators from the original ArunKBhaskar repo.

Each script is stored under /TradingViewScripts/

Key Files:
- SuperTrend.psc – Trend-following strategy with ATR
- RSI-Divergence.psc – Detects bullish/bearish divergence
- VWAP-Bands.psc – Anchored VWAP zone indicator
- EMA-Crossover.psc – Basic entry/exit signals based on moving average cross
- MACD-Alerts.psc – Momentum-based confirmation with visual alerts

These files can be pasted into TradingView’s Pine Script editor and customized.
